LanguageData.GR_EmptyIncubator.label: empty incubator
LanguageData.GR_EmptyIncubator.description: This animal incubator is empty. Use the Gene Pod and different genetic material vials to fill it.
LanguageData.GR_BearBoomalopePre.label: boomalope / bear incubator
LanguageData.GR_BearBoomalopePre.description: An incubator filled with a mixture of animal genetic material
LanguageData.GR_BearalopeIncubator.label: boomalope / bear incubator
LanguageData.GR_BearalopeIncubator.description: This incubator has to be kept at a temperature between 0 and 50 degrees Celsius until the genetically modified organism is ready to hatch. The embryo may develop into a Boomalope / Bear or Bear / Boomalope hybrid
